first of all everything related to communication so when you want to stall
or process your data in the cloud you need communication and you need relatively fast and reliable

in space or IOT in airplanes or underwater we have all kinds of projects

communication and you need to take everything into account the second law is the law of economics you're dealing

this is super important and in many cases when dealing with IOT devices they're creating a lot of data and some
of this data is irrelevant after few milliseconds and some of this data might
be very important for you for a later stage analytics but you don't need all

which one you're ok with keeping it locally and the last but not least is
the law of the land compliance for example might prevent you from sending
the data to the cloud from the other end compliance might might make you send a
copy of the data just to make sure that you have another copy in case you're losing it on the edge and all
those things should be taken into account when deciding well do I want to
